Looking at the failing tests and this PR seems to affect load reporting performance. I'll have to look into this more.
I think those failures are unrelated, I saw them pop up then go away on a PR I was working on. (in fact, I need to make sure I didn't cause them :))

```
[microbenchmarks] Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                       locks_per_iteration
------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ---------------------
BM_StreamCreateDestroy                                                          +199%
BM_StreamCreateSendInitialMetadataDestroy<RepresentativeClientInitialMetadata>  +199%
```

```
[microbenchmarks] Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                       locks_per_iteration
------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ---------------------
BM_StreamCreateDestroy                                                          +199%
BM_StreamCreateSendInitialMetadataDestroy<RepresentativeClientInitialMetadata>  +199%
```

@ncteisen I realize now that I only benchmarked and analyzed the minimal rpc scenario. It's possible that this PR could still cause problems in other scenarios. What's the best way to go about this besides running all of our benchmarks?

@ncteisen Ping on which benchmarks would be good to run just to ensure this change doesn't cause a performance regression. Do you know of any benchmarks that resize the arena frequently?

I don't know off the top of my head what benchmarks would resize the arena more than others.

You might try modifying bm_arena.cc to force some resizing?

```
[microbenchmarks] Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                       cpu_time    locks_per_iteration    real_time
------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------  ---------------------  -----------
BM_StreamCreateDestroy                                                                      +199%
BM_StreamCreateSendInitialMetadataDestroy<RepresentativeClientInitialMetadata>              +199%
BM_StreamingPingPongMsgs<InProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/262144            -5%                                -5%
BM_StreamingPingPongMsgs<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/32768          -6%                                -6%
BM_UnaryPingPong<MinInProcess, NoOpMutator, NoOpMutator>/0/2097152              -7%                                -7%
```
